column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I tried the chocolate cake
column3: but nothing amazing (not what I expected from the hype over this place). The combination of sea salt to chocolate was interesting
column4: the mousse and cream were rich but not too sweet
column5: and the crunchy base was a good texture contrast. I couldn't finish the whole cake (even though it was only a 2 in square) because of how rich it was
column6: so if you get it make sure you have a friend to share with! 4/5
